title: WATCH: Premier League funnies of the month - January
description: A selection of the funniest moments from the Premier League in January.
content: We had "rubbish" from Arsenal fans, a few embarrassing airshots in the penalty area; the January weather caused a few slips, and Federico Fernandez took a blow to the chops while celebrating a goal.And, as ever, we saw a referee fall over. Par for the course...Watch all that and more in the video aboveLive on Sky Sports this weekend we have Burnley v Man City (Saturday from 11.30am), Crystal Palace v Newcastle (Super Sunday from 1.30pm) and Liverpool v Tottenham (Super Sunday from 4.15pm).
